page.shortlink: form layout switch properties two-state or multi-state property
page.description: Specify if the switch has two states (on/off) or has multiple possible states (e.g. yes/no/undecided).

item.name: Two-state
item.description: Swtich control can have one of two states (e.g. on/off). See *[link:Two-state Switch Settings@formviewbuilder twostateswitch settings]*.

item.name: Multi-state
item.description: Switch control can have multiple states. Multiple states can be difined using Icons or HTML. See *[link:Mulit-state Switch Settings@form layout multistate switch settings properties]*.
